profile:
At Handy Monkey, we pride ourselves on providing the best mold removal and remediation service in the Greater Toronto Area. 

Here’s why:
Respected: Our inspectors and mold removal technicians are certified by the most reputable institutions, including the IICRC and InterNACHI. We realize how important high quality service is, and rely on our highly educated and experienced workers to deliver it. This attitude has earned us the award for Ontario’s Top Mold Remediation Company from Canadian-Contractors.org

Simple Solutions: We’ve also seen how overwhelming the construction business can be. Dealing with one company for mold removal, calling a plumber to find the source of the moisture and hiring your own drywaller to reconstruct the infected area sounds like a full time job. 

At Handy Monkey, we take care of all the headaches for you. We have all the tradespeople you need on hand to help identify and eliminate the underlying cause of your mold. Our construction division is also available to implement any necessary changes.

Affordable: Besides providing professional, comprehensive solutions, we also strive to keep our services affordable. Unlike some companies who complicate problems to take advantage of naïve clients, our goal is to educate our customers and explain the details of the work that’s required. We feel that the mutual bond we create with our clients is worth the forgone profits.

Our goal at Handy Monkey is to make your mold removal process as easy and painless as humanly.

Call 1-888-507-MOLD (6653) Today!
